title: Workplace-Based Transformative Learning Design: Intensive Language Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic workplace communication skills and intermediate-level job-specific terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening workplace language skills reflecting real job situations, structuring real-time collaborative learning environments via smartphones.

learning_goals: Participants can utilize effective language strategies for 10 or more conflict situations occurring in workplace environments.
Participants can accurately apply context-appropriate vocabulary and sentence structures in 80% or more of business-related documents (emails, reports, etc.).
Participants can clearly convey opinions and demonstrate negotiation skills three or more times in real-time online meetings with colleagues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
